outputs.output_descr: The proposed project will reduce risks and vulnerabilities from GLOFs and snow-melt flash floods in Northern Pakistan. The main objectives of the project are to develop the human and technical capacity of public institutions to understand and address immediate GLOF risks for vulnerable communities in Northern Pakistan and to enable vulnerable local communities in northern areas of Pakistan to better understand and respond to GLOF risks and thereby adapt to growing climate change pressures.

project_descr: Reducing Risks & Vulnerabilities from Glacier Lake Outburst Floods in Northern Pakistan (Pakistan GLOF Project)
project_title: Reducing risks from Glacial Lake Outburst (GLOF)
